divs: sighting detailsi observed a disc shaped object over the california side of the colorado river while on a walk this date. i left the rv at roughly 12:05 pm walking north to a marina and restaurant at shortly after noon. when rounding the marina at 12:22 pm, i noticed a silvery object over the ca side of the colorado river moving slowly in a sw direction. it was at about 5-6,000 feet (as measured from the heights of the hills below them) and at a horizontal distance of about 1\2 mile. it did not have any wings. it did not have any emissions or make any noise that i could hear. i watched it for about 45 seconds. it was sliding to the sw; slowly ascending, and then accellerating at a rate that i could not begin to describe. it did have a top or upper layer. i returned home at 12:32 pm. i appear to be missing 8-10 minutes.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Parker
There were no other sightings in Parker on or around April 1st 2012
Summary: Observed UFO over CA side of Colorado River this date
